title: MirrorInDrawer
body:
<<if $mirrorFound is false>>
    <<Textbox>>
    Hey, is that a mirror in the drawer? Let's take it.
    <</Textbox>>
    <<AddClue GameController SmallMirror>>
    <<Textbox>>
    Added Small Mirror to Clue Log.
    <</Textbox>>
    <<set $mirrorFound to true>>
<<else>>
    <<Textbox>>
    There's a mirror in the drawer. It is already in the Clue Log.
    <</Textbox>>
<<endif>>

title: PenInDrawer
body:
<<if $penFound is false>>
    <<Textbox>>
    Hey, there seems to be a pen in the drawer. Should we take a look at it?
  <</Textbox>>
  <<InspectChoice Drawer_With_Clue>>
 <<set $penFound to true>>
<<else>>
    <<Textbox>>
    There's a pen in the drawer. Should we inspect it?
  <</Textbox>>
  <<InspectChoice Drawer_With_Clue>>
 <<endif>>
